title: SMART BUYS 12" LP Record Mailers - Pack of 100 - Strong White Cardboard Peel & Seal Envelopes for Vinyl Records - 340x340mm - Reinforced Seams for Secure Shipping
features: PREMIUM DURABILITY FOR SAFE SHIPPING: Crafted from strong white cardboard, these mailers provide ultimate protection, ensuring your 12" LP records remain safe and secure during transit, with no risk of damage.
SECURE PEEL-AND-SEAL CLOSURE: The easy-to-use hot melt adhesive strip offers a tamper-proof seal, eliminating the need for extra tape and ensuring a reliable and secure closure for your shipments.
REINFORCED SEAMS FOR ADDED STRENGTH: Hot melt glued seams enhance durability, preventing splits or tears during handling, guaranteeing your records arrive in pristine condition.
PERFECT FIT FOR 12" LP RECORDS: Designed specifically for 12" LP vinyl records, these mailers feature external dimensions of 340mm x 340mm, offering a snug, secure fit for your valuable records.

VERSATILE PACKAGING OPTIONS: Available in packs of 10, 25, 50, and 100, these mailers are ideal for sellers, collectors, and vinyl enthusiasts looking for a professional, efficient, and cost-effective shipping solution.
description: Protect your valuable vinyl records with SMART BUYS 12"" Strong White LP Record Mailers , designed for secure and reliable shipping. Crafted from durable, high-quality white fibreboard, these mailers are built to withstand the rigours of transit, ensuring your 12"" LP records arrive safely and undamaged. Featuring a secure peel-and-seal closure with hot melt adhesive, these mailers provide a tamper-proof seal without the need for additional tape, offering peace of mind. The reinforced seams further enhance strength, preventing splits and tears. With external dimensions of 340mm x 340mm, these mailers are perfectly sized for 12"" LP records, providing a snug fit and reducing movement during shipping. Available in packs of 10, 25, 50, or 100, they’re ideal for vinyl record collectors, sellers, and enthusiasts looking for an efficient and professional solution for mailing records, documents, photos, and certificates. Whether you're sending a single album or large quantities, SMART BUYS ensures your items are well-protected and delivered in perfect condition. Product Specifications: Size : 340mm x 340mm (External Dimensions) Material : Strong white fibreboard (Cardboard) Closure : Peel-and-seal with hot melt adhesive Seam Type : Reinforced, hot melt glued seams Colour : External – White, Internal – Grey Quantity : Available in packs of 10, 25, 50, and 100 Shape : Square Weight : Approx. 0.1 kg per mailer Use : Ideal for shipping 12"" LP records, documents, photos, and certificates Durability : High-strength cardboard for secure protection during transit
